socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: Qualitative description of zinc therapy as inexpensive lifelong treatment
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Zinc therapy of acrodermatitis enteropathica

socioeconomic_analysis.justification: No quantitative cost-of-illness or economic burden studies specific to Acrodermatitis enteropathica were identified; only a qualitative case report noted zinc therapy is inexpensive. citeturn1search3
